form.title: New Test Run
form.description: Configure and launch a new test run. Select from various suites to analyze your application's performance and quality.
form.urlDescription: The full URL of the endpoint or page you want to test.
form.testSuitesDescription: Select one or more test suites to run against your target URL.
form.seoSwitchDescription: Perform a deep SEO analysis with AI.
form.requestConfigDescription: Define the HTTP request for the load test.
form.loadProfileDescription: Choose a preset or define a custom load profile for your test.
form.customProfileDescription: Define a custom profile if presets don't meet your needs. Leave stages empty to use VUs and duration.
form.stagesDescription: Define custom ramping stages for VUs over time.

error.atLeastOne: At least one test suite must be selected.

toast.historyClearedDescription: Previous test history has been cleared.
toast.testStartedDescription: Your test run has started. You can monitor the progress below.

clearHistoryDialog.title: Clear Previous History?
clearHistoryDialog.description: Starting a new test can clear your entire local test history. Would you like to clear it before this run?

descriptions.custom: Define your own VUs and stages.

running.title: Test is Running...
running.description: Please wait while the tests complete. You can view live load test results in Grafana.

summary.title: Test Complete
summary.description: The test run for {{url}} has finished. See the summary below.
summary.noK6Data: No k6 load test data available for this run.
summary.noLighthouseData: No Lighthouse audit data available for this run.
summary.noSeoData: No SEO analysis data available for this run.

history.title: Test History
history.description: Review and manage your past test runs. All data is stored locally in your browser.
history.noHistoryDescription: Run a new test to get started.

toast.exportSuccessDescription: Your test history has been saved as a JSON file.
toast.exportFailDescription: Could not export your test history.
toast.importSuccessDescription: Your test history has been successfully imported.
toast.importFailDescription: Could not import the selected file.
toast.importInvalidFormat: The selected file is not a valid history file.
toast.deleteSuccessDescription: The test run has been removed from your history.
toast.clearSuccessDescription: All test runs have been deleted.

clearAllDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
clearAllDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all of your test history and recent URLs.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
deleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete this test run from your history.

about.title: The Ultimate Local-First Testing Platform
about.description: K6 Commander is a lightweight, local-first, authorized load-testing and API development platform. It allows you to configure, run, and analyze load tests, Lighthouse audits, and SEO checks, as well as test APIs with a full-featured client—all from a sleek, responsive web UI.
about.localFirstDescription: Your data is yours. All test configurations, API requests, and results are stored in your browser's local storage, never on our servers.
about.unifiedToolingDescription: Stop juggling multiple apps. From load testing to API validation, get all the tools you need in one cohesive interface.
about.k6FeatureDescription: Harness the power of Grafana k6 to understand how your application performs under load.
about.k6HowItWorks: When you run a load test, the app spawns a k6 Docker container configured with your parameters. The container sends metrics to a local InfluxDB instance, which are then visualized in real-time in a pre-configured Grafana dashboard.
about.k6HowItWorks2: Once the test is complete, a final summary report is generated and displayed.
about.lighthouseFeatureDescription: Run Google Lighthouse audits directly from the UI to improve the quality of your web pages.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks: The app runs Google Lighthouse via npx in a child process on the server. It audits the given URL for performance, accessibility, best practices, and SEO.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks2: The final report scores are displayed in the UI, with a link to the full, interactive HTML report.
about.seoFeatureDescription: Leverage generative AI to perform a deep analysis of your page's on-page SEO factors.
about.seoHowItWorks: Using Genkit and the Google AI Platform, the application fetches your page's HTML, analyzes it against key SEO metrics, and provides actionable, AI-generated recommendations for improvement.
about.seoHowItWorks2: This provides insights beyond what a standard automated check can offer.
about.apiTesterFeatureDescription: A full-featured client to develop, test, and debug your APIs without leaving the app.
about.apiTesterHowItWorks: Make GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, or DELETE requests with custom headers, query parameters, and JSON bodies. Responses are displayed with status, time, and size.
about.apiTesterHowItWorks2: All requests are saved to a local history, which can be organized into collections. You can also import and export requests as cURL commands.
about.stackDescription: Built with modern, powerful, and open-source technologies.
about.involvedDescription: K6 Commander is open source and community-driven. We welcome contributions of all kinds, from bug reports to feature suggestions and code contributions.

apiTester.newCollectionDescription: Create a new collection to organize your API requests.

deleteCollectionDialog.title: Delete Collection?
deleteCollectionDialog.description: This will permanently delete the '{{name}}' collection and all of its requests. This action cannot be undone.

apiTester.noRequestsDescription: Your sent requests will appear here.

deleteRequestDialog.title: Delete Request?
deleteRequestDialog.description: This will permanently delete this request from your history. This action cannot be undone.

importCurlDialog.title: Import from cURL
importCurlDialog.description: Paste a cURL command below to import it as a request.

toast.cannotDeleteDefault: The default 'Scratch Pad' collection cannot be deleted.
toast.curlImportErrorDescription: Could not parse the cURL command. Please check the format.
toast.curlImportSuccessDescription: The cURL command has been imported.
toast.jsonFormatErrorDescription: The body content is not valid JSON.
toast.apiCurlCopiedDescription: The request has been copied as a cURL command.
toast.curlCopyInvalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL before copying.
toast.curlCopyErrorDescription: Could not generate the cURL command.

apiTester.noResponseYetDesc: Send a request to see the response here.
